column3: $Gene Handley twisted his knee and was carried off the field
$Majeski hit in head, carried off field to ambulance and hospital; he did not play again until August 9

$Throw hit runner going to third in the back
$Mike Tresh's throw hit Bob Savage on the back
$Ferris Fain left with a twisted ankle
$the throw struck Johnny Pesky on the back

ej,fainf101,P,boyej901,Fighting $Ferris Fain went back to 3B after scoring to get his cap and  threw a punch at Eddie Pellagrini, who he thought had tried to  trip him; Pellagrini threw a couple of punches before the two players were separated; Fain ejected by 3B umpire Jim Boyer; Pellagrini was not ejected which led to a loud protest by Athletics coach Earle Mack
ej,cronj101,M,romme101,Balls and strikes $Red Sox Manager Joe Cronin ejected by HP umpire Rommel for arguing balls called from pitcher Murphy last inning
this account has lots of guessing in it
